title: Friday, October 26, 2018- Week Four- Day Five
wod:
Zotts Press: 3×3
Snatch Balance: 3,2,1,1,1
Behind the Neck Jerk: 5×1
Snatch Deadlifts: 3×3
Russian Twists: 3×30. Slow and Controlled. 
Hip Extensions: 3×10

title: Wednesday, October 24, 2018- Week Four- Day Three
wod:
Hang Snatch + Power Snatch: (1+1) x 3
Clean Pull + Clean (1+1) x 4. 
Back Squats: 3,2,1,3,2,1

title: Thursday, October 24, 2018- Week Four- Day Four
Tuesday, October 23, 2018- Week Four- Day Two
wod:
Push Press: 3×5. Light and Perfect!
Push Jerk: 3,2,1,1,1
Power Clean + Jerk (1+1)x2x 3 working sets. 
Clean Pulls: 3×3
3 Sets:
Weighted Planks x 30 seconds
KB Side Bends x 20 each side

title: Monday, October 22, 2018- Week Four- Day One- Slight Deload
wod:
Muscle Snatch: 3,3,2,2,1,1
SN PP + OHS (2+2) x 3
Snatch: 3×3, 3×2, 3×1. Work consistency and keep the weight where you can feel fast and snappy. 
Front Squat: 5,4,3,2,1

title: Sunday, October 21, 2018- Week Three- Day Seven
Saturday, October 20, 2018- Week Three- Day Six
wod:
Snatch: Work up to a heavy single for the day
Clean and Jerk: Work up to a heavy single for the day
Front Squat: Work up to a heavy double in five sets.

title: Friday, October 19, 2018- Week Three- Day Five
wod:
Zotts Press: 3×3
Snatch Balance: 3,3,2,2,2,1,1
Behind the Neck Jerk + Jerk: (1+1) x 5 working sets. 
DB Single Arm Waiter Walk Walking Lunge x 10 steps with right arm overhead and 10 steps with left arm overhead. 
Russian Twists: 3×30. Slow and Controlled.

title: Thursday, October 18, 2018- Week Three- Day Four
Wednesday, October 17, 2018- Week Three- Day Three
wod:
Hang Power Snatch + Hang Snatch: (2+1) x 4 
Power Clean from Below Knee + Push Jerk + Behind the Neck Jerk (1+1+1) x 4
Low Bar Back Squats: 5,3,1,5,3,1,10,8. 
In between squat sets perform single leg DB Deadlifts x 10 each leg and Seated Single Arm DB Press x 10 each arm.
